---
title: Test Resume Template
filters:
  # - fenced.lua
  - ../filters/elements.lua
  - ../filters/test_filter.py
  - iconify

format:
  html:
    toc: false
    page-layout: full
    include-in-header:
      - file: ../includes/overlay.html
  pdf:
    template: template.tex
    keep-tex: true
    template-partials:
      - ./title.tex

format-links:
  - text: tex
    href: ./test.tex
resume:
  sidebar:
    tex_width: .2
    headshot:
      url: https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/77076023?v=4
      title: Headshot
      description: Its'a Me!
    contact:
      info_text: Click any row to learn more about each contact method.
      size: 24 #px;
      include_titles: true
      include_overlay: true
      kind: table
      content:
        - title: Phone
          value: (111) 111 - 1111
          description: |
            I am available by phone Monday - Friday, 8 AM - 4 PM MST.
            If I can not pick up, please feel free to leave a voice mail.
          image:
            iconify:
              set: hugeicons
              name: smart-phone-01
              label: Phone
        - title: Email
          value: dude@place.org
          description: |
            This is my email address for work.
            Please do not send me spam.
            Only send me legitimage inquiries.
            If I do not get back to you right away and you need me to just call.
          image:
            iconify:
              set: hugeicons
              name: mail-01
              label: Email
        - title: Carrier Pigeon
          value: Bert
          description: |
            Bert is my carrier pigeon.
            Find bert and tell him what you need me to hear.
            He can talk, he just won't talk to you because he is shy.
          image:
            iconify:
              set: misc
              name: birds
              label: Carrier Pigeon
    skills:

      li_margin: 16
      include_titles: true
      include_overlay: true
      kind: list
      content:
        - title: CI/CD
          since: 2021-05-01
          description: Continuous Integration and Deployment
          category: devops
          image:
            iconify:
              set: logos
              name: github-actions
              label: Continuous Integration and Deployment
        - title: Lua
          since: 2022-11-01
          category: languages
          description: |
            Lua is a language that I have used because it the language used to
            configure ``nvim``. It is also used to write ``pandoc`` filters.
          image:
            iconify:
              set: devicon
              name: lua
              label: Lua
        - title: Quarto
          since: 2024-07-01
          category: tools
          description: |
            Quarto powers this document.
          image:
            iconify:
              set: misc
              name: quarto
              label: Lua
        - title: Terraform
          since: 2022-05-01
          category: tools
          description: Infrastructure as code.
          image:
            iconify:
              set: devicon
              name: terraform
              label: Terraform
        - title: Python
          since: 2017-08-01
          category: tool
          description: Python is my favorite language.
          image:
            iconify:
              set: devicon
              name: python
              label: Python
        - title: Docker
          since: 2021-03-01
          category: devops
          description: Docker is a powerful containerization tool.
          image:
            iconify:
              set: devicon
              name: docker
              label: Docker

    links:
      size: 24
      info_text: Click on any of the icons to open in a new tab.
      include_overlay: false
      type: list
      content:
        - title: Linkedin
          href: https://www.linkedin.com/in/adrian-cederberg-b453571b9
          description: My profile on linkedin.
          image:
            iconify:
              set: devicon
              name: linkedin
              label: Linkedin

        - title: Github
          href: https://github.com/acederberg
          description: My github account.
          image:
            iconify:
              set: devicon
              name: github
              label: Github

        - title: Blog
          href: https://acederberg.io
          description: My Blog
          image:
            iconify:
              set: hugeicons
              name: house-01
              label: Blog

    # NOTE: Skills are reusable for experience section and should be put in a

  body:
